episodes.title: Countdown to the Epstein files: Gloria Allred weighs in
episodes.description: As the deadline for the release of the Jeffrey Epstein files approaches, one of the most recognized legal voices in America is sending a very clear signal: don't look away. Civil rights attorney Gloria Allred joined KREX News anchor Justin Adam Brown for a compelling interview – warning that when those documents land, we may be forced to rethink everything we thought we knew about power, fame, and silence.
